discover.title: Discover — Collect everything that exists about you
discover.lede: Prepare, then methodically collect your online footprint. This is a process, not a one‑click fix. Everything you enter here stays on your device. Do not paste passwords.

tip.onePlatform: Tip: work one platform at a time to avoid overwhelm.

discover.pickPlatformHelp: We recommend starting with the platform you use most. You can come back and repeat for others.

prep.title: 2) Preparation
prep.notebook: Open a notebook or doc for raw notes.
prep.assets: List your usernames, emails, phone(s), and known accounts.
prep.scope: Pick scope: this platform only (recommended) or full footprint.
prep.safety: Don’t paste passwords here; if needed, record counts like "same password on 3 accounts".

pii.title: What is PII? Risk levels
pii.lede: PII = information that can identify, locate, impersonate you. Risk depends on context and uniqueness.

items.gov: Government IDs, DOB + full name + city combined
items.unique: Unique full names or rare usernames
items.photos: Photos with location clues (street signs, plates)

pii.note: Even a name can be high risk if it’s very unique or linked with city, workplace, or relatives.

analyze.title: Analyze — Risk triage
analyze.lede: Load your Discover session, cluster findings, and mark priorities.
analyze.tile: Turn findings into risk and priorities.

reduce.title: Reduce — Lock it down
reduce.lede: Turn triage into action. Work one platform at a time.
reduce.tile: Turn priorities into actions and mark them done.

keepsafe.title: Keep Safe — Stay private over time
keepsafe.lede: Build privacy habits and schedule periodic reviews.
